data.text:
Was our first time in Egypt and  we came up trumps for sure ü§ó
The hotel when you first arrive looks very unassuming compared to some of the other grand facades, but on entering you‚Äôre welcomed into a huge reception / seating area with a beautiful hanging light. From arriving we had the most welcoming staff and this continued throughout our holiday they cannot do enough to help/please you. Our room was a lovely large room quite modern for the usual Egypt rooms I‚Äôd reviewed, we had a lovely guy who cleaned our room everyday left clean towels ( sometimes in art displays ) and replenished our mini bar we got 2 large bottles of water everyday as well as fruit juice and soft drinks.
The resort itself was huge and always immaculately clean. 
The desert rose has 4 restaurants you can use as well as the palm which is the main restaurant, sadly the Lebanese one was being refurbished while we was there, we did try the Italian which was ok just not for us . the Mexican we really enjoyed we went twice during our stay a young lad called malad waited on us again couldn‚Äôt do enough to make sure we enjoyed our meal he‚Äôs such a friendly lad we spoke often at the snack bar he served at during the day to.If you visit I would recommend the sweet corn soup its delicious and the fajitas üòã
We didn‚Äôt try the fish restaurant as sadly my hubby isn‚Äôt a fan of fish unless it‚Äôs wrapped in batter ü§£ it does have rave reviews though 
One of my favorite bars would have to be the Tropicana it‚Äôs the first bar you see as you come through the main reception area this is a more chilled out bar we had a lovely pianist playing one evening you can grab a cappuccino if you don‚Äôt fancy a drink 
The food was fantastic the choice was unbelievable, always hot and fresh , I loved the omelette station in a morning for breakfast or two dippy eggs on toast, ( again the man who made these outside the palm restaurant always smiling and chatty ) the pasta station for making your own from ingredients to sauce and choice of pasta. 
Always fish and meats of choice 
The desserts wow so light and delicious especially the coconut macaroons they were the hubbys favorite. 

If your thinking about it don‚Äôt hesitate book it you won‚Äôt regret it 

As a couple we have travelled to many places but this one was one that we wished we had booked a longer stay we truly didn‚Äôt want to go home 
We have booked already to go back ü§ó
data.title: First time in Egypt

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear elizabeth2471972, 

We would like to thank you for the time you have taken to review your recent stay with us in Desert Rose. We enjoy hosting all of our guests and do hope that we would have the privilege of doing again in the near future. 
Kind Regards, 
Guest Relation Team
owner_response.author: Mohamed Amin

data.text: Resort is excellent for family, plenty of things to do, and varied variety of food. Highly recommend the entertainment , the dancers are excellent , amazing and full of energy, and the singers are killers too. Lots of games for kids, pool is fantastic.
data.title: Family resort, full of fun and good food

data.text: Just returned from the loveliest week away at Desert Rose Resort, this was our first trip to Egypt. The resort staff were so respectful and attentive. Food was fantastic. Rooms were always clean and tidy. Could not have asked for a better experience. Also the resort is only 15 mins taxi ride from the airport which was really convenient. Very safe atmosphere, great for families or couples. Highly recommend!
data.title: Fantastic trip to Egypt, highly recommend!

data.text: We was here now 1 week, and had a fantastic time stay here, some small problem with Door card and the safe in room, but the food, aktivities, service was very good,  and amazing show in Winther garden every evening 21.00 so we recommend the hotel if you going to Egypt.
data.title: AMAZING HOTEL
